tenant-in-uk.legend: Are they living in the UK?

living-status.legend: Does the person already live in the property?

reference-number.label:
Home Office reference number

If the person has applied for a visa with the Home Office, they will be issued with a reference number. This could be an application or appeal number, an Application Registration Card (ARC) number or a case ID number.

brp-number.label:
Biometric residence permit number

A biometric residence permit is an identification card that proves the holder has the right to live, work or study in the UK. You can still provide this number if the card has expired.

recorded-delivery-number.label: Recorded delivery number of {{values.tenant-name}}'s latest application to the Home Office

tenant-brp-number.label: Biometric residence permit number
tenant-brp-number.hint: It's on the top right corner. For example 'RS1234567'.

yes.label: Yes I want to add another person

no.label: No I do not want to add another person

agent-email-address.label: Email address
agent-email-address.hint: We will use this to let you know the outcome of the check

agent-phone-number.label: Phone number
agent-phone-number.hint: We may use this number to contact you with queries

representative.legend: Are you the landlord or an agent acting on behalf of the landlord?

landlord-company.label: Rental company name
landlord-company.hint: If you don't have one, leave this blank

landlord-email-address.label: Email address
landlord-email-address.hint: We will use this to let you know the outcome of the check

landlord-phone-number.label: Your phone number
landlord-phone-number.hint: We may use this number to contact you with queries
